TOCHome / Profiles defined as part of this Guide

Profiles defined as part of this Guide

Profiles

The following Profiles have been defined for this implementation guide.

  • Argonaut_Adaptive_QR_Profile The Argonaut Adaptive QR profile is derived from the [Argonaut QR profile](StructureDefinition-qr.html) requiring a [*contained*](http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/references.html#contained)[Argonaut Questionnaire Profile](StructureDefinition-q.html) to support the [adaptive questionnaire use case](adaptive.html). This profile defines the structure that is passed between the Client and Server using the [`$next-q`](OperationDefinition-next-q.html) operation and records the question-answer pairs and questionnaire questions from the adaptive questionnaire.
  • Argonaut_Adaptive_Q_Profile The Argonaut Adaptvie Q profile sets the minimum expectations for the Questionnaire resource for the [adaptive questionnaire use case](adaptive.html). It defines the [*contained*](http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/references.html#contained) structure that is passed between the Client and Server using the [`$next-q`](OperationDefinition-next-q.html) operation and records the questionnaire questions and calculated scores from the adaptive questionnaire.
  • Argonaut_QCVS_Profile The Argonaut Questionnaire Contained ValueSet Profile is contained within the Argonaut Questionnaire Profile: - It requires an [expansion] of the code set to constrains the concepts to particular set of conditions for a given questionnaire. - The [Ordinal Value] *extension* is added as a [Must Support] element to support the calculation of scores from the associated assessments. - The `ValueSet.url` element is constrained to a [Must Support] element to provide an alternative literal address at which this value set is (or will be) published.
  • Argonaut_QR_Profile The Argonaut QR profile sets the minimum expectations for the QR resource to record, search and fetch QR from simple assessments, surveys, etc as defined in this implementation guide
  • Argonaut_Q_Profile The Argonaut Q Profile sets the minimum expectations for the Questionnaire resource to record, search and fetch Questionnaire for simple assessments, surveys, etc as defined in this implementation guide


    • Extensions

    These extensions have been defined for this implementation guide.

  • Argonaut Project Questionnaire Time Limit Extension Argonaut Project Questionnaire Time Limit Extension defines a duration associated with completion of a Questionnaire or Questionnaire item. This is used to determine if the end user has completed the Questionnaire or individual questions or groups of questions within the specified time-period. How the start time is defined is an implementation detail outside of scope of this Implementation Guide.
  • Argonaut Project Questionnaire Score Extension Argonaut Project Questionnaire Score Extension defines a numerical score associated with a question, or answer choice if using the `option` element. Use the [ordinalValue](http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/valueset-ordinalValue) extension to score individual choices in a valuset
